name: CAT in THE PLATAFORM
description:
thank you for open that page '-' DESCRIPTION:

Congratulations you scaped from the dungeom(previus game) but the bad vegetables army is seeking for you. So its your time to fuck up them(not literatly). you have a gun and some friends to help you(actualy you are alone).

CONTROLS:

Arrows - move

Z - jump

X - shoot (yes you can shoot things)

ESCAPE -  in game menu

SPACE - select things in menu

just an alpha of my fist plataformer game so there are some issues that i think that will be fixed in the near future
